summary: This mod add three rings in skyrim to enchanted to redistribute yours health magicka and stamina when you wear them
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]What is it ?[/u][/b]
This mod is designed to allow you to redistribute temporary your health, stamina and magicka following simple rules.

[u]How does it work ?[/u]
a simple script that mimic an enchantement behavior

[b][u]What does it do ?[/u][/b]
It add three rings that will put all the magicka, stamina and health you got with your levels in a \"common pot\" and redistribute them like this :
[list]
[*]The ring of the wizard will give you 3x more magicka than health and no stamina
[*]The ring of the warrior will give you 3 HP for 2 stamina point and no magicka
[*]The ring of the balance will give you as magicka as health as stamina
[/list]
Note : It does not affect stats obtained by a potion or an enchantment or when you start the game

[b][u]I want those rings ![/u][/b]
The last magus capable of understand this enchantment was the archmage Gauldur during the first era, this secret was lost in the time, maybe you can find something in a book ? otherwise I heard that sometimes the academy begin archaeological excavations maybe can they help you in your research ?

[b][u]Some notes ...[/u][/b]
[list]
[*]It\'s a really simple mod and I suggest you to use it with Dragonborn because it bring another part to perform a total respecialization 
[*]I do not mastered the English language when I was five (like you) so be patient with me :-)
[*]If you have any question/request don\'t be shy I\'m a nice guy :-)
[/list]
author: nem-e5i5
